name: Mekk-Knight Red Moon
text: If 2 or more cards are in the same column, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to that column. You can only Special Summon "Jack Knight of the Crimson Lotus" once per turn this way. You can banish 1 "Jack Knight" monster from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster on the field in this card's column; destroy it.
